entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Resident Evil Village for Mac
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.399,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,90 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫1.399,00]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,90

In-App Purchases

  • DLC packÔºö‚Ç∫389,00
  • All Access VoucherÔºö‚Ç∫69,99
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫78,99

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Resident Evil Village
entry.summary:
Base Game: ‚Ç∫1.399,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,90
All Access Voucher: ‚Ç∫174,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫69,99
DLC pack: ‚Ç∫769,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫389,00
Street Wolf Outfit: ‚Ç∫105,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫78,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Base GameÔºö‚Ç∫1.399,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,90 [‚Ç∫329,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.399,00]
  • All Access VoucherÔºö‚Ç∫174,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫69,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫174,99]
  • DLC packÔºö‚Ç∫769,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫389,00 [‚Ç∫209,00 ~ ‚Ç∫769,00]
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫105,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫78,99 [‚Ç∫45,99 ~ ‚Ç∫105,00]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Base GameÔºö‚Ç∫349,90
  • All Access VoucherÔºö‚Ç∫69,99
  • DLC packÔºö‚Ç∫389,00
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫78,99

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Voucher ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†Keyboard and mouse are not supported. ‚ñ†We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 16GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 3 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Base GameÔºö‚Ç∫2.599,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫869,00 [‚Ç∫429,00 ~ ‚Ç∫2.599,00]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Base GameÔºö‚Ç∫869,00
  • Separate WaysÔºö‚Ç∫349,00
  • Extra DLC PackÔºö‚Ç∫579,00
  • Attach√© Case: 'Gold'Ôºö‚Ç∫35,99
  • Weapon Upgrade Ticket x5 (A)Ôºö‚Ç∫264,99
  • Charm: 'Handgun Ammo'Ôºö‚Ç∫35,99
  • Weapon Upgrade Ticket x1 (A)Ôºö‚Ç∫78,99
  • Weapon Upgrade Ticket x3 (A)Ôºö‚Ç∫194,99
  • Charm: 'Green Herb'Ôºö‚Ç∫35,99
  • Attach√© Case: 'Classic'Ôºö‚Ç∫35,99

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†Keyboard and mouse are not supported. ‚ñ†We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 30GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 6 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes ‚ñ†Save data can be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? ‚ñ∂Features: ‚óè Build your Monster Collection ‚Ä¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! ‚Ä¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. ‚Ä¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! ‚óè Form a Battle Strategy ‚Ä¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. ‚Ä¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! ‚Ä¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. ‚óè Become the Champion ‚Ä¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! ‚Ä¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. ‚Ä¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle‚Äôs atrocity. ‚óè Take the Battle Online ‚Ä¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! ‚Ä¢ Complete 100+ online missions. ‚Ä¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.title: Quakeline
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫79,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

Application Description

After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love? In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city ‚Äî from Bakƒ±rk√∂y to √úsk√ºdar ‚Äî to find the woman you love. Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul ‚Äî from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor. On your journey to save your girlfriend, you‚Äôll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins‚Äîand their stories‚Äîwill push you to make difficult moral choices. To move forward, you‚Äôll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely. Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit. Witness the struggle to survive‚Äîand the power of hope. In this unforgettable journey, you‚Äôll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

entry.title: Day One
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫389,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫122,99 [‚Ç∫122,99 ~ ‚Ç∫389,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫122,99

Application Description

Apple‚Äôs App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world‚Äôs most trusted digital journal. ‚ÄúDay One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.‚Äù ‚Äì New York Times ‚ÄúDay One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.‚Äù ‚Äì Wired ‚ÄúThis superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.‚Äù ‚Äì Macworld WHY DAY ONE? Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE ‚Ä¢ Beautiful, award-winning design ‚Ä¢ Unlimited text entries ‚Ä¢ Unlimited photos and videos* ‚Ä¢¬†Powerful rich text formatting with markdown ‚Ä¢ Different journals for every aspect of your life* PRIVATE AND SECURE ‚Ä¢ Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe ‚Ä¢ End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private ‚Ä¢¬†Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID ‚Ä¢¬†Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT ‚Ä¢¬†Programmable reminder notifications ‚Ä¢ Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer‚Äôs cramp ‚Ä¢¬†Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries ‚Ä¢ Today view provides a summary of where you‚Äôve been and what you‚Äôve done JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ The ability to email entries straight to your journal BUILT FOR REMINISCING ‚Ä¢ On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories ‚Ä¢ Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you‚Äôre looking for ‚Ä¢ Map view quickly shows all the places you‚Äôve journaled from *Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today. Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/ For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/
